#include<cstdio>
#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>
int ans[1000];
int main() {
    register int i,N,l;
    ans[1]=1;
    int b[10]={0,1,6,1,6,5,6,1,6,1};
    ans[2]=5;
    ans[3]=4;
    for(i=4;i<1001;i++){
        ans[i]=(ans[i-1]+b[i%10])%10;
    }
    char sd[4];
    while(1){
          scanf("%s",sd);
          l = strlen(sd);
          N = 0;
          if(strcmp(sd,"#")==0) return 0;
          for ( i = 0; i < l; i++ ) {
		N = (N<<1)+(N<<3)+(sd[i] - '0');
          }
          printf("%d\n",ans[N]);
    }
return 0;
}
